text: CLOSE Attorneys for reality TV star Chris Soules are negotiating with prosecutors on a possible deal to resolve his charge of leaving the scene of an accident. Zachary Boyden - Holmes, DesMoines Buy Photo Chris the courtroom for a hearing in Buchanan County District Court Monday, Nov. 27, 2017, in Independence, Iowa. Reality TV star Soules is charged with leaving the scene in a fatal April crash near Aurora, Iowa. ( Photo : Rodney White / The Register / POOL ) Buy Photo Chris Soules, the reality television celebrity from Iowa, is set to avoid trial in connection with a deadly crash last year in northeast Iowa after pleading guilty to a reduced charge Tuesday.
